com.viaoa.util

Class OAPool<TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.util.OAPool<TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    TYPE - type of objects to be pooled.

    public abstract class OAPool<TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a pool of objects, with a mini and max limits, and will shrink/release if not needed or time.
    Author:
    vvia

        public void loadMinimum()
        This will make sure that the pool has at least minimum amount of objects. By default, the pool will start with size zero objects.
